languages.text: "Передайте им: утверждение истинно. Амарнат вернулся, чтобы воцариться и объединить свою паству".
"Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."
languages.original_text: "Передайте им: утверждение истинно. Амарнат вернулся, чтобы воцариться и объединить свою паству".

traits.locale_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."
"Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."
"Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."
"Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."
"Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."

languages.text: “告诉他们，这种说法是真的。阿玛纳特已经回来了，准备将他的追随者团结在一起，为他们指明道路。”
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."

traits.locale_text: “告诉他们，这种说法是真的。阿玛纳特已经回来了，准备将他的追随者团结在一起，为他们指明道路。”

languages.text: « Dites-leur que cette affirmation est vraie. Amarnat est de retour pour régner sur ses ouailles et les unifier. »
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."

traits.locale_text: « Dites-leur que cette affirmation est vraie. Amarnat est de retour pour régner sur ses ouailles et les unifier. »

languages.text: «Dígales que es verdad. Amarnat ha vuelto para reinar y reagrupar a su rebaño».
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."

traits.locale_text: «Dígales que es verdad. Amarnat ha vuelto para reinar y reagrupar a su rebaño».

languages.text: 「その発言は真実だと伝えてくれ。アマルナトは民を治め、団結させるために戻ってきた」
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は真実だと伝えてくれ。アマルナトは民を治め、団結させるために戻ってきた」

languages.text: "Sagt ihnen, dass die Aussage stimmt. Amarnat ist zurückgekehrt, um zu herrschen und seine Herde zu vereinen."
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ihnen, dass die Aussage stimmt. Amarnat ist zurückgekehrt, um zu herrschen und seine Herde zu vereinen."

languages.text: "Şu söylediklerimi ilet: Doğru. Amarnat, sürüsünü birleştirip önderlik etmek için geri döndü."
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Amarnat has returned to reign and unite his flock."
